Test steps: 1. Start the game.,2. Confirm that items (fruits or dots) appear at random positions on the grid.,3. Move the snake to eat an item.,4. Verify that the snake becomes longer after eating the item.

1. Start the game.,2. Move the snake in such a way that it collides with the grid boundaries.,3. Verify that the game displays a Game Over message.,4. Move the snake in such a way that it collides with itself.,5. Verify that the game displays a Game Over message.
1. Start the game and achieve a high score.,2. Close the game.,3. Start the game again and check if the highest score is retained.
